questionTitle: The shop assistant was ________ helpful, but she felt he could have given her more advice.
The meal was excellent; the pears were particularly ________.
Are there any seats left for this evening's ________ of "Carmen"?
Having ________ the table, Mrs Roberts called the family for supper.
As I have been ill, I have had no ________ to discuss the plan.
He ________ to turn up for the football match.
The shop assistant was ________ helpful, but she felt he could have given her more advice.
There are three lawyers in our town and I have consulted ________ of them in turn.
The course was so difficult that I didn't ________ any progress at all.
I'm tired of looking at ancient ________. Let's go to somewhere modern.
My car's gone: it must ________.
We'd better hurry. There's a ________ to Uncle Timothy's patience.
I ________ hands with him when I was introduced to him.
They had a great ________ of trouble getting through customs.
Rose trees need to be ________ regularly.
Whatever made you think ________ such a thing?
I would go to the seaside if the weather ________ good.
I rang you up while Jack ________ his lessons.
The bus ________ from High Street to the Station Road is 30p.
Before the invention of refrigeration, the ________ of fish and meat was a problem.
